title: Why do we even have teambuilder up so much
body:
So far as I can tell we don't have the population to sustain it along with the other 5's queues, so it's empty in an infinite loop where nobody is playing it so nobody plays it because queues take forever because nobody is playing it.

Put 3s or Dominion or something up at those times, even if queues are equally bad at least its something different than 5s (though if I could actually get a queue to pop I would probably play TB whenever I don't feel like ranked instead of just blind and try to get what I feel like playing that way)

replies.body: i don't think its a matter of one or another, but having dominion wouldn't really do anything imo (unless its run like TT) it would just be another empty queue atleast team is there for people who simply cant be bother playing anywhere else

i thin that normal blind pick will eventually become obsolete and they are slowing making the transition, i actually really like team builder, the atmosphere from the start is 100x better than blind pick

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=9Thg2aEU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-10T07:06:47.226+0000)
>
> i thin that normal blind pick will eventually become obsolete and they are slowing making the transition, i actually really like team builder, the atmosphere from the start is 100x better than blind pick

so do I, the problem is that while blind pick is there it will remain dead, so we just have an empty queue sitting there doing nothing when we could have 3s or dominion up instead
